item.title: Two Very Quick Suggestions
item.dc:creator: Zen609
item.description:
TCMOREIRA:

At least if there was a way to comment on just the suggestion itself,and see/hide the comments (utopian stuff).

It still wouldn’t be as simple as that. All comments are ordered chronologically, and there’s no way to discern a suggestion from any other comment. All the comments regarding various suggestions would be intermingled, the discussion would be unintelligible. It wouldn’t be a ‘thread’, it would be 50 discussions happening at the same time with no way of following any of them. And the suggestions themselves would be buried in an ocean of comment salad. It would be an incredible mess, even with a show/hide feature.

Read full topic

item.title: Two Very Quick Suggestions
item.dc:creator: TCMOREIRA
item.description:
Dr. Maxwell:

Why can’t the barnacle tongues be set up to distinguish between physics objects and NPCs and treat them differently?

Yeah, I was thinking the same. Good point!!

Zen609:

Right, there are a lot of suggestion threads, I understand where you’re coming from with this. There’s a trade-off with making a suggestion sticky: it might organize suggestions in one place, but in order to be useful, it couldn’t have discussion. But as separate non-sticky threads, the suggestions can be discussed. The devs read all this stuff. They take feedback seriously. In a sticky, we wouldn’t be able to have discussion - that would be a huge mess.

I agree. Discussion is necessary indeed. At least if there was a way to comment on just the suggestion itself,and see/hide the comments (utopian stuff).

item.title: Two Very Quick Suggestions
item.dc:creator: TCMOREIRA
item.description:
Zen609:

You mean a sticky thread? As moderators, that isn’t our decision. The sticky threads are official threads. That would have to be the decision of an administrator. They read all the threads, so they’ll likely read your suggestion, and either act or not act depending on what they think about it.

Okay. [Also… I suggested this after seing alot of suggestion threads]

dky.tehkingd.u:
  1. The people can’t animate because that would screw up the fact that the tongues can interact with physics objects… ie, the people who get eaten must also become physics objects (meaning dead ragdolls).

There must be another way. I’m sure they could figure it out. (Or invent something). [But you seem like someone who understand the engine, so… you may be right and that’s not possible].
